home.tagline: A passionate software developer building clean, scalable backend systems.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a final-year Computer Engineering student, graduating in June 2025, specializing in backend development with Golang and Java. I focus on writing clean code and building scalable systems.

responsibilities: Engineered 10+ RESTful endpoints using Golang to enhance API scalability.
Built a filtering system with 9 column-based options using PostgreSQL.
Designed WebSocket connections using Event-Driven Architecture in Go.
Developed an integration for CloudQuery using Golang, storing 10K+ cloud environment data in ArangoDB.
Used Docker, Kubernetes, Skaffold to deploy 6 services with 2 databases.
Optimized AWS ECS, EKS, RDS, and ECR for scalable infrastructure.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on.

items.name: URL Shortener
items.description: A URL shortening service built with Java Spring Boot, following the MVC architecture and Clean Code principles. Supports 4 endpoints, custom domains, MongoDB for storage, and JUnit testing.

items.name: CAPTCHA Verification System
items.description: A secure user verification system using Spring Framework, supporting CAPTCHA generation and validation via RESTful APIs. Built with Hibernate and PostgreSQL, tested using Maven and JUnit 5.

items.name: Waste Management Backend
items.description: A backend system built with Golang (Fiber) and PostgreSQL, deployed on AWS EC2/RDS using Docker Compose and CI/CD via GitHub Actions.

items.name: Note Taking App
items.description: An authenticated note app with 11 endpoints built using Golang + Fiber. Collaboratively developed and documented using Swagger.

items.name: ToDo App
items.description: A 9-endpoint task manager built with Gin and MongoDB, including authentication. Fully containerized and documented.

items.name: City List and Traffic Codes
items.description: A 6-endpoint REST API using PostgreSQL with Redis caching and RabbitMQ for message queuing.
